MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the KY10 postcode area of Anstruther is still ongoing. This is due to difficult ground conditions on site and we now expect power to be back on by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.23pm on Wednesday 28th October 2020.
